body: I have been getting bored of nebula because I just reached prestige 5 lvl 50 and I am bored I get no xp this is not fun, other mini-games like avicade I might play but I do not like as much as nebula so i am asking if someone avigill or howsie or ivy can reset my Stats, By stats I mean My prestige leave my kd and other things like time online ect. but I want a clean sleight for more prestige or you can just make 5 more Until prestige 10,

replies.body: If your stats were to be reset, everyone would have to be given an opportunity to make it fair. That would take a tremendous amount of effort.

replies.body:
Statistical resets are not possible. The database would break.

Your answer is no
